data.text: @CraigleRock86 @angelovalidiya @YahooNews You are incorrect for healthy teenagers. They don’t have serious issues with COV-19.
@angelovalidiya @YahooNews Every medicine that is currently considered "safe" has the potential for side effects. These numbers aren't that significant and the benefits still far outweigh the risks.

@angelovalidiya @YahooNews Applying the algorithms from EE sim to a quantitative analysis based modeling of the entire covid system is what the book is about. The ENTIRE covid system includes covid itself, plus psychology, sociology, physics, epidemiology, et al including govt measures WITH disease.

@angelovalidiya @YahooNews “We can accelerate technology” - 1st line in your tweet is basis of book chapter I’m formulating. My career was in semiconductor & electronic R&D. The acceleration is a result of modeling & simulation. To simulate 1sec of a CPU would take months. No better mod/sim exists than EE

@angelovalidiya The 'circle of trust' has made a deal, rest subservient or propoganda delusioned.
Some doc, scientists raised questions but got heavy backlash and credibility assassination /reprimand from chairs & associations.

@angelovalidiya @YahooNews We can ignore reality, but we cannot ignore the consequences of ignoring reality.
Ayn Rand

@angelovalidiya True, they are messing with nature and our innate immunity on assumptive models though even med literature clearly states that exact mechanism and dependencies are yet not fully known in B cell memory compartments.
